summary: This module provides a suite of pytest unit tests that exercise AWS App Mesh API operations using a mocked AWS environment. The tests cover creating, describing, listing, updating, and deleting meshes, virtual nodes, virtual routers, and routes, as well as tagging resources and retrieving tags.
business_intent: Validate that the App Mesh client correctly handles lifecycle and tagging operations for mesh components, ensuring reliable behavior in automated testing and continuous integration pipelines.
